path.style: fill: rgb(3, 92, 100); paint-order: stroke; stroke: rgb(3, 92, 100); vector-effect: non-scaling-stroke; stroke-width: 0px;
fill: rgb(79, 190, 159); paint-order: stroke; stroke: rgb(79, 190, 159); vector-effect: non-scaling-stroke; stroke-width: 0px;
fill: rgb(41, 141, 130); paint-order: stroke; stroke: rgb(41, 141, 130); vector-effect: non-scaling-stroke; stroke-width: 0px;
